relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, mucous membranes moist, oropharynx clear
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved heart rate to <100 bpm after receiving 3L IVF with 40 mEq of potassium.
